database.saveDomain: INSERT INTO DOMAIN (ID, DATE, CATEGORY, NAME) VALUES ($id, '$date', N'$group.$category', N'$name')
database.saveMeta: INSERT INTO META (ID, DOMAIN_ID, TITLE, DES, IMAGE, TIME, SOURCE_TIME, URL) VALUES ($id, $domain, N'$title', N'$des', '$image', '$time', '$source_time', '$url')
database.saveContent: INSERT INTO CONTENT (META_ID, CONTENT, DATE) VALUES ($meta, ?, '$date')
database.saveRelation: INSERT INTO RELATION (META_ID, RELATION_ID, PERCENT) VALUES ($meta, $relation, $percent)
database.saveImage: INSERT INTO IMAGE (ID, META_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, NAME, IMAGE) VALUES ('$id', $meta, '$type', '$name', ?)
